belongs_to_collection.name: La niña de tus ojos - Colección

overview: A company of Spanish movie makers leaves Franco's Spain and moves to Hitler's Germany to make a film in co-production. Soon some problems start to arise...

production_companies.name: Creativos Asociados de Radio y Televisión (CARTEL)

tagline: A romantic comedy about war, filmmaking and impossible love.
title: The Girl of Your Dreams
